Putnam Exam | 2011: B1

Putnam 2011: B1\n[imath]\begin{array}{r}\n\forall \mathbf{h}, \mathbf{k} \in \mathbb{N}, \varepsilon>\mathbf{0} \\\n\mathbf{\exists m}, \mathbf{n} \in \mathbb{N} \\\n\varepsilon<|\mathbf{h} \sqrt{\mathbf{m}}-\mathbf{k} \sqrt{\mathbf{n}}|<2 \varepsilon\n\end{array}[/imath][imath]\forall \mathbf{h}, \mathbf{k} \in \mathbb{N}, \varepsilon>\mathbf{0} [/imath] [imath]\mathbf{\exists m}, \mathbf{n} \in \mathbb{N} [/imath] [imath]\varepsilon<|\mathbf{h} \sqrt{\mathbf{m}}-\mathbf{k} \sqrt{\mathbf{n}}|<2 \varepsilon[/imath]
